CanBreakDoors.title: Can Break Doors
CanBreakDoors.description: True if the zombie can break doors (default value is 0).

DrownedConversionTime.title: Drowned Conversion Time
DrownedConversionTime.description: The number of ticks until this zombie converts to a drowned, or husk to zombie.

InWaterTime.title: In Water Time
InWaterTime.description: The number of ticks this zombie or husk has been under water, used to start the drowning conversion.

IsBaby.title: Is Baby
IsBaby.description: True if this zombie is a baby.
